IdentifierType

Parameter identifier-type:token

Search parameter to search for resources by identifier.type

ResourcesPatient, Practitioner, Organization, Location, Encounter, MedicationRequest, MedicationAdministration, Medication
Expressionidentifier.type
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: IdentifierType
